articles.author: Marc Levy, Paul Wiseman
articles.title: Trump says US Steel will keep HQ in Pittsburgh in a sign he'll approve bid by Japan-based Nippon - AP News
articles.description: President Donald Trump says U.S. Steel will keep its headquarters in Pittsburgh as part of what he called a “partnership” between the American steelmaker and Japan-based Nippon Steel, which sought to buy it. Trump's statement Friday left it vague as to whethe…
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) President Donald Trump said Friday that U.S. Steel will keep its headquarters in Pittsburgh as part of what he called a planned partnership that seemed to signal that hell approve a b… [+4379 chars]
